welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kirkel, a charming town in Germany known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover the unique charm of this city during your stay. Enjoy your visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ensheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
